name: The Starving Dungeon
description:
Play as Steve as you bash your way through this dungeon! Throw objects, eat food, and dodge incoming attacks while delving deeper into the starving dungeon.


Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Pickup / Throw
E - Eats food (While picked up)

This game was made for the Dani's Basement Game Jam in a 5 day period.

Coder - N0vaKnight

Artist - Tehabruh

Composer - Curruff

Designer - Nickaronii
